creator: vroyer@althes.fr
text:
When requesting for all properties on a locked files, the tomcat buld-in webdav 
servlet return an out-of-namespace <A:href> as shown in following traces.

<response><href>/metawebdav/bookmarks.htm</href>
<propstat><prop><resourcetype/><lockdiscovery><activelock><locktype><write/></lo
cktype>
<lockscope><exclusive/></lockscope>
<depth>Infinity</depth>
<owner>
<A:href>anonymous</A:href>
</owner>
<timeout>Second-3599</timeout>
<locktoken><href>opaquelocktoken:dummytoken</href>
</locktoken>
</activelock>
</lockdiscovery>
<getcontentlength>1104</getcontentlength>
<getcontenttype>text/html</getcontenttype>
<getlastmodified>Fri, 03 May 2002 09:24:14 GMT</getlastmodified>
</prop>
<status>HTTP/1.1 200 OK</status>
</propstat>
</response>

creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
text: Fixed in CVS and will be included in the next release.
